name: Asmr Apartment
description:
Welcome to Asmr Apartment. In this app you experience relaxing binural Asmr sounds in a virtual reality environment. With or without a VR headset you can move around an Apartment exploring the variety of soft spatial 3d sounds.


You can watch Asmr Videos on the Tv with ASMRTube and there are several binaural directional sounds playing through the apartment.


Without a vr headset you can use the directional stick to move around. You can switch over to VR by pressing 3 fingers on the screen.


ASMR stands for Autonomous sensory meridian response (ASMR) is a euphoric experience characterized by a static-like or tingling sensation on the skin that typically begins on the scalp and moves down the back of the neck and upper spine, precipitating relaxation.


Enjoy!
